item.description:
Fells Lecture Series â€“

Monday, June 21 6:30 to 8:30pm Summer Solstice Celebration

Boot Boutwell During the period when the midday sun reaches its highest point in the sky we will celebrate the season with solstice history and lore, poetry, a solstice story and a walk in the woods to enjoy the beauty of nature on the first, and longest, day of summer. The program will end with a short ceremony to welcome in the solstice followed by juice and cookies.

Pre-registration required; call Boot Boutwell [B-)] at (781) 729-4712. Stay tuned for more details.
mentione meet up organiser "aimee " to clearify the group.

We invite you to join us for this free event to learn more about the Fells!



Meet Up location start point
Botume House Visitor Center - Middlesex Fells Reservation
Department of Conservation and Recreation (DCR)
4 Woodland Road, Stoneham, MA
item.name: Winchester Fells Reservation Summer Solstice Celebration
